name: The Great Machine's Escape
description:
STORY:  You are a small robot, but a great machine on the inside! You are in a factory and you escaped before your final assembly so your health is decreasing rapidly and your time is limited. The goal is to escape the factory while you keep yourself alive by picking up oil bottles along the way.

This is my first codejam/gamejam and my first game using my own custom 2d game engine that i made with C++ and openGL.

Source Code: https://github.com/johnoyo/2DGameEngineOpengl

I hope you like it!
